author: cmlenz
msg: Add tests to verify that the redirectors are correctly added to an empty war, depending on whether the input web.xml is without DOCTYPE, with a 2.2 DOCTYPE or a 2.3 DOCTYPE
(Note: currently these tests require an internet connection because for some reason the DTDs are looked up online. I'll try to fix that ASAP)
